mapper.select: SELECT P.*, I.basic_intr,I.best_intr,fin_co_info.img_url FROM savingProduct as P JOIN (SELECT fin_prdt_cd, min(intr_rate) AS basic_intr, max(intr_rate2) AS best_intr from savingOption GROUP BY fin_prdt_cd) AS I ON P.fin_prdt_cd = I.fin_prdt_cd JOIN fin_co_info ON P.fin_co_no = fin_co_info.fin_co_no

SELECT distinct p.*,I.basic_intr,I.best_intr,fin_co_info.img_url FROM savingProduct AS p JOIN (SELECT fin_prdt_cd, min(intr_rate) AS basic_intr, max(intr_rate2) AS best_intr from savingOption GROUP BY fin_prdt_cd) AS I ON p.fin_prdt_cd = I.fin_prdt_cd JOIN fin_co_info ON p.fin_co_no = fin_co_info.fin_co_no JOIN savingKeyword AS k ON p.fin_prdt_cd = k.product_id WHERE k.term_class IN
#{item}

SELECT P.*, I.basic_intr, I.best_intr, fin_co_info.img_url FROM savingProduct as P JOIN (SELECT fin_prdt_cd, min(intr_rate) AS basic_intr, max(intr_rate2) AS best_intr from savingOption GROUP BY fin_prdt_cd) AS I ON P.fin_prdt_cd = I.fin_prdt_cd JOIN fin_co_info ON P.fin_co_no = fin_co_info.fin_co_no where P.fin_prdt_cd = #{id}
